achievement: Led the transition of our product from an on-premises product to a cloud-based platform using AWS.
Built several production Node.js web services that I deployed & managed in AWS using several products including ECS, Fargate, Docker, API Gateway, RDS, Lambda, and more.
Built out a suite of tests with Mocha & Chai and documented my modules with JSDoc.
Built & deployed a GraphQL server on top of our cloud data with Apollo Server, Sequelize, DataLoader and more, and deployed it to an AWS Fargate (Docker) cluster behind API Gateway.
Developed serverless Node.js apps for data collection from 3rd party services using Lambda, API Gateway, S3/SQS, and more.
Designed relational data structures in our AWS Aurora Postgres instances, and indexed tables appropriately to address performance in large datasets.
Created a survey engine in React that allows users to build & send custom personalized surveys.
Improved UX of Razor views in C#/.NET apps.
Improved performance of complex SQL queries for generating reports.
Fixed bugs & added functionality to C#/.NET & Ruby on Rails controllers.
Developed internal web apps for collecting performance review data, as well as a responsive web app for inventorying assets with a mobile device & bluetooth barcode scanner.
Created & Improved SQL queries for ETL processes.
Managed users and their permissions in Active Directory.
Configured routing & subnet settings on routers and switches.
Ran network cabling through buildings and troubleshot network connected devices.
